thread.title: Here’s Your First Look at Vetements’ Latest Reebok Collaboration
thread.title_full: Here’s Your First Look at Vetements’ Latest Reebok Collaboration

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Here’s Your First Look at Vetements’ Latest Reebok Collaboration
text:
After recently getting a closer look at Vetements’ insane Instapump Fury , the ever-popular fashion label is back alongside Reebok for another sneaker collaboration.
This time around we see the two presenting a shoe noting less of a DIY approach than the aforementioned Instapumps, but boasting an overall worn aesthetic. The retro-flavored sneaker was revealed during Vetements’ FW17 runway show, as Demna Gvasalia referred to them as an “old” take. Clearly.
Be sure to leave us your thoughts on this new Vetements x Reebok collaboration.
#VETEMENTSxREEBOK 
A photo posted by VETEMENTS (@vetements_official) on Jan 30, 2017 at 9:19am PST
